Package edu.ou.cs2334.project5.models

Class NonogramModel

java.lang.Object
edu.ou.cs2334.project5.models.NonogramModel
public class NonogramModel extends Object
This class holds the rules of the entire game by storing rules and cell states.
Author:
Natalie Hill

      public CellState getCellState(int rowIdx, int colIdx)
      This retrieves the state of a given cell.
      Parameters:
      rowIdx - the index of the row in the Nonogram
      colIdx - the index of the column in the Nonogrma
      Returns:
      the state of a cell at the row/column index

    • getCellStateBoolean

      public boolean getCellStateBoolean(int rowIdx, int colIdx)
      This changes the state of a given cell into a boolean value.
      Parameters:
      rowIdx - the index of the row in the Nonogram
      colIdx - the index of the column in the Nonogrma
      Returns:
      the state of a cell at the row/column index as a boolean value

    • setCellState

      public boolean setCellState(int rowIdx, int colIdx, CellState state)
      This changes the state of a cell at a given index in the Nonogram. I received help from Keon Moradi on this method.
      Parameters:
      rowIdx - the index of the row in the Nonogram
      colIdx - the index of the column in the Nonogrma
      state - the state the index should be changed to
      Returns:
      true if the index was changed or false if it was not
